name: Sharks With Feelings
description:
"The shark who loses feels awful, but the shark who wins feels even worse. This is the state of shark kind; these are sharks with feelings." 

Made for Ludum Dare 29.

This game is a TWO-PLAYER shark-fighter or something. Humans are ammo, jellyfish are rad, and mines are dangerous. (Edit: Added Single-player mode. Press 'Enter' in game.)

Player 1: 'W,A,D'+'Spacebar'
Player 2: 'Arrow keys'+'Ctrl'
('Esc' to quit. 'R' to Restart if needed.)
('Enter' on main menu to change controls if you want!)

//

HEY YOU, On MacOSX: if you get an error claiming the application is damaged go to System Preferences > Security & Privacy, click the lock at the bottom of the window to unlock, change "Allow apps downloaded from" to "Anywhere"

// 

FermenterGames.com/SharksWithFeelings
